rooms.name: Bohemian Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: An open, airy space with bohemian elements including exposed brickwork, colorful textiles, and eclectic furniture. The living area flows into the kitchen, designed for a home chef with ample counter space and vintage appliances.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A private, soundproof office space with ample natural light and a view of the terrace. It includes ergonomic furniture designed to boost productivity while incorporating bohemian elements such as wall art and plants.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy, bohemian bedroom with a mix of vintage and modern furniture. The space is designed for relaxation, featuring soft textures, natural light, and calming color palettes.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact, modern bathroom integrated with the bedroom, featuring eco-friendly fixtures and bohemian accents.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A welcoming door with natural wood finish, aligned with Vastu principles by opening to the east.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access Door
openings.description: Door leading to the rooftop terrace, ensuring seamless access and adherence to Vastu principles for open space.

openings.name: Living Room Window
openings.description: Large window providing ample natural light to the living area and kitchen.

plot.description: A single-story studio apartment cottage designed on a 60x90 feet plot with emphasis on open spaces and seamless indoor-outdoor connectivity. The design incorporates bohemian aesthetics, sustainable materials, and Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
plot.vastu_considerations: Orientation of rooms for prosperity (East), knowledge (North), relationships (West) and stability (South).
